definitions.definition: One of the two long pieces of wood, extending before a vehicle, between which a horse is hitched; a shaft .
The shallow stratum of underclay that lies under a seam of coal ; the bottom of a coal-seam.

main_definition: One of the two long pieces of wood, extending before a vehicle, between which a horse is hitched; a shaft .
secondary_definitions: ( mining ) The shallow stratum of underclay that lies under a seam of coal ; the bottom of a coal-seam.
